EmailTemplate.name: Current Trial: January 2016.Day 12 Not Engaged
EmailTemplate.subject: Set up your Bigcommerce store before your trial ends
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You still have three days in your free trial You still have three days in your free trial We noticed you haven't set up your online store yet. You can set it up in just a few easy steps by logging in now.
Or, pick a plan that's right for you and get the time you need to build your store. Pick a plan <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login]]>
